alert.note: Alert for Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 8:55PM CST until March 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch possible. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Wright County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM Saturday to midnight CST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
